description: Application Activity events describe actions executed within an application
caption: Application Activity
name: application_activity

1.caption: Create
1.description: One or more resources were created.

2.caption: Read
2.description: One or more resources were read.

3.caption: Update
3.description: One or more resources were updated.

4.caption: Delete
4.description: One or more resources were deleted.

6.caption: Import
6.description: An import was performed into an Application.

7.caption: Export
7.description: An export was performed from an Application.

8.caption: Share
8.description: One or more resources were shared.

src_endpoint.description: Details about the source of the activity.

resources.description: Details about resources that were affected by the activity/event.

resources_result.description: Details on the resources resulting from the activity.
